userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], William Foutz Account Books, WLU Coll. 0157, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA.
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections staff to verify the appropriate format.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: William Foutz owned a flour mill in Rockbridge Baths, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is a daybook and ledger accounts of flour sales.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.
